headers.text: No. of the Act in the Collection of Laws

rows.text: Constitutional decree of the President concerning new organization of the government and ministries in the interim period Ústavní dekret prezidenta o nové organizaci vlády a ministerstev v době přechodné

Decree of the President amending some clauses of the military criminal code and defense code Dekret prezidenta, kterým se mění a doplňují některá ustanovení vojenského trestního zákona a branného zákona

Decree of the President concerning the invalidity of some transactions involving property rights from the time of lack of freedom and concerning the National Administration of property assets of Germans, Hungarians, traitors and collaborators and of certain organizations and associations Dekret prezidenta o neplatnosti některých majetkově - právních jednání z doby nesvobody a o národní správě majetkových hodnot Němců, Maďarů, zrádců a kolaborantů a některých organizací a ústavů
Redress of war and occupation Retribution

Invalidation of any property transfers that took place after 29 September 1938 under duress of occupation or as a consequence of national, racial or political persecution, and its return to original owners. Establishment of national administration of factories and enterprises owned by "state-unreliable persons" (i.e. those who elected German or Hungarian ethnicity in 1929 census and traitors).
Gift of real estate for the purposes of Soviet embassy.

Decree of the President concerning the confiscation and expedited allotment of agricultural property of Germans, Hungarians, as well as traitors and enemies of the Czech and Slovak nation Dekret prezidenta o konfiskaci a urychleném rozdělení zemědělského majetku Němců, Maďarů, jakož i zrádců a nepřátel českého a slovenského národa

Confiscation of agricultural property owned by Germans and Hungarians, notwithstanding nationality, with exception of those who actively took part in the fight for preservation and liberation of the state traitors and enemies of the state, notwithstanding ethnicity and nationality corporations which had served German war effort or other fascist or nacist efforts

Decree of the President concerning the punishment of Nazi criminals, traitors and their helpers and concerning extraordinary peoples' courts Dekret prezidenta o potrestání nacistických zločinců, zrádců a jejich pomahačů a o mimořádných lidových soudech
Decree of the President concerning the National Court Dekret prezidenta o Národním soudu
The decree was promulgated with effectiveness for a period of one year.
Decree of the President concerning the Collection of Laws and Regulations of the Czechoslovak Republic Dekret prezidenta o Sbírce zákonů a nařízení republiky Československé
Establishes the authority of the President, subject to consent of the Government, to enact binding laws in the form of decrees for as long as the Parliament cannot perform its function.
Prolongation of effectiveness of Act No. 20/1945 Coll. until the Interim National Assembly convenes
Promulgated on 5 March 1945, rendered ineffective by the first convention of the Interim National Assembly on 28 October 1945

Decree of the President concerning the promulgation of laws promulgated outside of the Czechoslovak territory Ústavní dekret prezidenta o vyhlášení právních předpisů, vydaných mimo území republiky Československé
Decree of the President concerning the unification of the tax legislation within the Czechoslovak Republic Dekret prezidenta o sjednocení celního práva na území republiky Československé
Decree of the President concerning the abolishment of the Act of 9 July 1945 Dekret prezidenta o zrušení zákona ze dne 9. července 1945
Abolishment of Act No. 165/1934 Coll., on retirement of judges according to their age
According to Act No. 165/1934 Coll., judges were retiring at age of 65. German Nazi extermination of many Czechoslovak judges led to need for longer service of those remaining.
Decree of the President concerning the unified management of internal settlement Dekret prezidenta o jednotném řízení vnitřního osídlení
Legal framework for measures for the "return of all areas of the Czechoslovak republic to the original Slavic inhabitants."

Decree of the President concerning the settlement of Czech, Slovak or other Slavic farmers on the agricultural land of Germans, Hungarians and other enemies of the state Dekret prezidenta o osídlení zemědělské půdy Němců, Maďarů a jiných nepřátel státu českými, slovenskými a jinými slovanskými zemědělci.
Distribution of land which had not previously been distributed under Act No. 12/1945 Coll., to stately and nationally reliable Czechs, Slovaks and other Slavs.

Constitutional Decree of the President concerning modification of Czechoslovak citizenship of persons of German and Hungarian ethnicity Ústavní dekret prezidenta o úpravě československého státního občanství osob národnosti německé a maďarské

Czechoslovak citizens of German or Hungarian ethnicity who had gained German or Hungarian nationality, lost the Czechoslovak one on that day, other lost the Czechoslovak nationality on the day of promulgation of the Act. The decree does not concern Germans and Hungarians who declared Czech or Slovak ethnicity after 21 May 1938, or prove that they remained loyal to the Czechoslovak Republic, had not committed offense against the Czech or Slovak nation and that they had either taken part in the liberation of Czechoslovakia or were subject to Nazi or fascist terror This was review by the Ministry of Interior; in case of German/Hungarian soldiers serving in the Czechoslovak army abroad by Ministry of Defense with presumption of fulfillment of the conditions. Czechs and Slovaks who elected German/Hungarian nationality under duress may request exemption by the Ministry of Interior. Married women and children were to be assessed individually.

Germans and Hungarians carried the burden of proof that they had remained loyal to the Republic (unless they were members the Czechoslovak army abroad or elected Czech or Slovak nationality during the occupation). Under Art. 3 of the Act, those who lost Czechoslovak citizenship could request its restoration within 6 months of promulgation of the Act. The request was to be decided by the Ministry of Interior. Later, in 1948, the Regulation No. 76/1948 Coll. was adopted, under which the period for request for prolonged for 3 years. the Ministry of Interior was bound to restore applicant's citizenship of unless it could determine that the applicant had breached their "duties of Czechoslovak citizen".

Decree of the President concerning the interim limitation of payment of deposits by banks and financial institutions in the borderlands Dekret prezidenta o přechodném omezení výplat vkladů u peněžních ústavů (peněžních podniků) v pohraničním území

Prohibition of payouts or transfers to Germans and Hungarians by Czechoslovak or German/Hungarian banks in the borderland (with exception of those Germans/Hungarians who remained loyal to the Czechoslovak Republic, had not committed offense against the Czech or Slovak nation and had either taken part in the liberation of Czechoslovakia or were subject to Nazi or fascist terror)
Decree of the President concerning the severe punishing of looting Dekret prezidenta o přísném trestání drancování
5–10 years (10-20 or life in case of aggravating circumstances) of imprisonment for looting, possibility of enacting martial law in case of widespread looting
Decree of the President concerning the abolishment of the Act of 9 July 1945 Dekret prezidenta o dočasné příslušnosti ve věcech náležejících soudům porotním a kmetským
Until the end of 1945, panels of 4 judges were to decide criminal cases where otherwise jury trials were appropriate.
Constitutional decree of the President concerning Interim National Assembly Ústavní dekret prezidenta o Prozatímním Národním shromáždění
Establishment of the Interim National Assembly for the period until the National Assembly is elected in the general elections.

Interim National Assembly consisted of 200 Czechs and 100 Slovaks elected by electors, who had been elected by local National Committees. Slovak deputies had veto power over issues concerning Slovakia.
Decree of the President concerning the measures in the area of film industry Dekret prezidenta o opatřeních v oblasti filmu
Nationalization of cinematic industry, prohibition of filming and public screening
Prohibition of filming and public screening abolished from 28 August 1945
Decree of the President concerning the interim management of the national economy Dekret prezidenta o zatímním vedení státního hospodářství
Use of public assets before the State Budget is approved by the National Assembly.
Decree of the President concerning the redress of grievances of the Czechoslovak public employees Dekret prezidenta o odčinění křivd československým veřejným zaměstnancům

Decree of the President concerning the registration of wartime damages and damages caused by exceptional circumstances Dekret prezidenta o přihlašování a zjišťování válečných škod a škod způsobených mimořádnými poměry

Registration damages caused by war operations, by occupation authorities or by other acting on their orders, due to persecution on political, national or racial grounds, or by terrorist actions of the enemy states or persons dangerous to the public.
Registration had to be made within 21 days from promulgation of the enactment.
Decree of the President concerning the modification of the wage of the President of the Czechoslovak Republic Dekret prezidenta o úpravě platu prezidenta Československé republiky
Annual wage of 3.300.000 koruna and office expenses of 3.000.000 koruna
Decree of the President concerning the wage and acting and representative allowance of the members of the Government Dekret prezidenta o platu a o činovním a representačním přídavku členů vlády
Annual wage of the Prime Minister 120.000 koruna, Vice-Prime Minister 100.000 koruna, Ministers 80.000 koruna
Decree of the President concerning the wage increase of state and other public employees Dekret prezidenta o platovém přídavku státním a některým jiným veřejným zaměstnancům
Decree of the President concerning the abolishment of appointment of public employees during the time of oppression Dekret prezidenta, jímž se zrušují jmenování veřejných zaměstnanců z doby nesvobody
Abolishment of appointment of employees of the state, regional and municipal administrations, public corporations and publicly owned companies, as well as teachers

Governmental authority to execute treaty of 29 June 1945, especially concerning possibility of the people living in Carpathian Rutheania to opt for the Czechoslovak citizenship, derogation of constitutional rights in breach of the treaty.
Decree of the President concerning the easement in the criminal trials Dekret prezidenta o úlevách v trestním řízení soudním

Among many other changes, appellate courts decided in panels consisting of three judges instead of previous 5, possibility of stopping of criminal proceedings where the penalty would me minor compared to a sentence which the defendant is already serving, etc.
Decree of the President concerning the Economic Council Dekret prezidenta o Hospodářské radě
Decree of the President concerning the Official List of the Czechoslovak Republic Dekret prezidenta o Úředním listě republiky Československé
Regulations and Directives that were not promulgated in the Collection of Laws were promulgated in the Official List

Decree of the President concerning the restoration of functioning of disciplinary and qualification commissions for public employees and concerning abolishment of regulations on limitation of appeals Dekret prezidenta, jímž se obnovuje činnost disciplinárních a kvalifikačních komisí pro veřejné zaměstnance a zrušují se předpisy o omezení opravných prostředků
Decree of the President concerning the reactivation of public employees Dekret prezidenta o reaktivaci veřejných zaměstnanců
Possibility to recall public employees in pension back to service where needed.
Decree of the President concerning the work duty of persons that had lost the Czechoslovak citizenship Dekret prezidenta o pracovní povinnosti osob, které pozbyly československého státního občanství

Work duty on repairing war damage, apart from Germans and Hungarians that had lost citizenship concerns also Czechs and Slovaks that had, unless under duress, applied for German or Hungarian citizenship during the occupation, work duty is subject to remuneration.
See also Act No. 88/1945 Coll., lower, establishing universal work duty notwithstanding ethnicity or collaboration.

Decree of the President concerning the change of the wage act of 24 June 1926 No. 103 Coll, as regards University Professors and Assistants Dekret prezidenta, kterým se mění a doplňuje platový zákon ze dne 24. června 1926, č. 103 Sb., pokud jde o profesory vysokých škol a vysokoškolské asistenty
Decree of the President concerning the reactivation and reappointment of married women in the public service Dekret prezidenta o reaktivaci a o opětném ustanovení provdaných žen ve veřejné službě

Occupation Governmental Regulation No. 379/1938 Coll. led to termination of married women from public jobs. Under the decree, these women may request reappointment within 6 months of its promulgation.

Decree of the President concerning the call for means of transport for the period of exceptional economical circumstances Dekret prezidenta o požadování dopravních prostředků po dobu mimořádných hospodářských poměrů
Local authorities may request means of transport (horses, cars) from private owners for important reasons, e.g. harvest, coal delivery, etc.
Public distribution system was in place after the war.

Decree of the President concerning some measures for the acceleration of loading and unloading of goods transported by rail Dekret prezidenta o některých opatření k urychlení nakládky a vykládky zboží v železniční dopravě
Decree of the President concerning the interim financial securing of business companies Dekret prezidenta o přechodném finančním zabezpečení hospodářských podniků
Decree of the President concerning some measures in the area of associations Dekret prezidenta o některých opatřeních v oboru spolkovém
Abolishment of regulations and measures of the occupation authorities leading to dissolution of associations.
Decree of the President concerning the advance payments on some wartime damages Dekret prezidenta o zálohách na náhradu za některé válečné škody majetkové
Concerns advance payments on wartime damages to socially poor persons.
At the time of promulgation, it has not been known that Germany will never repay any war damages.

Decree of the President concerning the military obligations of conscripts as well as soldiers who entered military voluntarily Dekret prezidenta o úpravě branné povinnosti osob povolaných,jakož i dobrovolně nastoupivších do činné služby
Concerns especially soldiers fighting with Czechoslovak army units abroad or partisans. These were considered as conscripted as of the day of joining the respective unit.
Decree of the President concerning the interim adjustment of length of conscription Dekret prezidenta o přechodné úpravě délky presenční služby
Concerns soldiers conscripted prior to the occupation or during occupation (the latter especially in Slovakia).
Czechoslovak army was dissolved during the occupation, soldiers who had not served full length had to re-list for a defined period of time.
Decree of the President concerning the abolishment of tuition at state secondary schools Dekret prezidenta, kterým se ruší školné na státních středních školách
Abolishes tuition at secondary state schools introduced by regulation No. 161/1926 Coll. (It had not applied to those who could not afford it.)
Charter of Fundamental Rights and Freedoms

Decree of the President concerning the rebuilding of Financial Guard in the Bohemian and Moravian-Silesian lands and on adjustment of some duty and wage issues of members of the Financial Guards Dekret prezidenta o znovuvybudování finanční stráže v zemích České a Moravskoslezské a o úpravě některých služebních a platových poměrů příslušníků finanční stráže
Reinstatement of the Financial Guard and reappointment of its members, appointment of its 1938 cadets (with remission of entrance exams)
Decree of the President concerning universal work duty Dekret prezidenta o všeobecné pracovní povinnosti
Any person may be called to perform work duty which is in public interest for period of one year maximum. Work duty subject to remuneration.

Decree of the President concerning honors for merits in building the state and for extraordinary work performance Dekret prezidenta o vyznamenáních za zásluhy o výstavbu státu a za vynikající pracovní výkony
Assigning of distinctions in the field of economy, science or culture for extraordinary merits in building of state or for extraordinary work performance.
Follows Soviet model: honorary titles such as "Hero of the Work", "Work Fighter", badges, etc.
Decree of the President concerning the adjustment of organizational and duty issues in the area of judiciary Dekret prezidenta o úpravě některých organisačních a služebních otázek v oboru soudnictví
Division of judiciary, judges' wages, organization of courts, etc.
Decree of the President concerning the restoration of the Czechoslovak currency Dekret prezidenta o obnovení československé měny
Decree of the President concerning the interim measures in the area of public social insurance Dekret prezidenta o prozatímních opatřeních v oboru veřejno-právního sociálního pojištění

Authorization of the Minister of Work and Welfare to undertake measures in the field necessitated by the wartime occupation (i.e. authority of welfare offices, organizational and administrative measures in the border areas, etc.)

Decree of the President concerning the adjustment of some issues of organization and duty and wages of uniformed prison service Dekret prezidenta o úpravě některých otázek organisace a služebních a platových poměrů sboru uniformované vězeňské stráže

Decree of the President concerning registraton of bank deposits and other financial obligation by financial institutions, as well as life insurance and securities Dekret prezidenta o přihlášení vkladů a jiných peněžních pohledávek u peněžních ústavů, jakož i životních pojištění a cenných papírů
The branch became Army Medical Academy in 1951 and a Medical Faculty of Charles University in its own right in 1958. Today it provides, inter alia, tuition of military doctors.
Decree of the President concerning the amendments on special income taxes Dekret prezidenta, kterým se mění a doplňují ustanovení o zvláštní dani výdělkové
Decree of the President concerning the interim measures in the area of turnover taxes Dekret prezidenta o přechodných opatřeních v oboru daně z obratu
Amendment of regulations No. 314/1940 Coll., No. 315/1940 Coll., No. 390/1941 Coll. and other regulations and directives.

Decree of the President concerning the adjustment of direct taxes for calendar years 1942 through 1944 and on adjustment of fees and business charges Dekret prezidenta o úpravě přímých daní za kalendářní roky 1942 až 1944 a o úpravě poplatků a daní obchodových
Decree of the President concerning the nationalization of mines and some industrial enterprises Dekret prezidenta o znárodnění dolů a některých průmyslových podniků

Nationalization of mines and industrial enterprises in the fields of energetics, metallurgy, armaments, chemicals, and other (altogether 27 fields, in some only enterprises having defined number of employees, e.g. paperworks with more than 150, etc.). Nationalization is subject of remuneration, with exception of former owners being: Germany/Hungary, or companies incorporated in Germany/Hungary physical persons having German or Hungarian ethnicity, unless they prove that they remained loyal to the Czechoslovak Republic and that they had not committed offence against the Czech or Slovak nation and that they had either taken part in the liberation of Czechoslovakia or were subject to nacist or fascist terror traitors
Nationalization obsolete Remuneration valid and effective

Subject of many contemporary court decisions, especially in proceedings whereby descendants of former owners are attempting to prove that their ancestors fulfil the requirements of remunaration in cases where authorities in 1940s and 1950s did not consider the ancestors loyal to the Republic and/or subject to Nazi terror
Decree of the President concerning the nationalization of some enterprises in the area of food industry Dekret prezidenta o znárodnění některých podniků průmyslu potravinářského

Nationalization of sugar mills and refineries, industrial distilleries, large breweries, large mills, factories producing artificial fat, large chocolate factories. Subject to renumeration under conditions of Act No. 100/1945 Coll.
Nationalization obsolete Remuneration valid and effective

Subject of many contemporary court decisions, especially in proceedings whereby descendants of former owners are attempting to prove that their ancestors fulfil the requirements of remunaration in cases where authorities in 1940s and 1950s did not consider the ancestors loyal to the Republic and/or subject to Nazi terror
Decree of the President concerning the nationalization of banks Dekret prezidenta o znárodnění akciových bank
Nationalization of shares of the banks subject to remuneration under similar condition as in Act. No. 100/1945 Coll.
Decree of the President concerning the nationalization of private insurers Dekret prezidenta o znárodnění soukromých pojišťoven
Decree of the President concerning the plant and factory councils Dekret prezidenta o závodních a podnikových radách
Basis for establishment of de-facto unions at factories.
Decree of the President concerning the cleansing commissions for reevaluation of actions of public employees Dekret prezidenta o očistných komisích pro přezkoumání činnosti veřejných zaměstnanců

Punishment (ranging from rebuke to sacking from job) for registering to German or Hungarian ethnicity, political cooperation with Germans or Hungarians (especially in Germanic societies), propagation or approval of fascism or antisemitism, etc.

Subject of many contemporary court decisions, especially in proceedings whereby descendants of former owners are attempting to prove that their ancestors fulfil the requirements of remuneration in cases where authorities in 1940s and 1950s did not consider the ancestors loyal to the Republic and/or subject to Nazi terror
Decree of the President concerning the wages of the interim National Assembly Dekret prezidenta o platech členů Prozatímního Národního shromáždění

Decree of the President concerning the interim adjustment of fee equivalent in the Bohemian and Moravian-Silesian lands Dekret prezidenta o přechodné úpravě poplatkového ekvivalentu v zemích České a Moravskoslezské
Decree of the President concerning the confiscation of enemy's property and on the Fund of National Restoration Dekret prezidenta o konfiskaci nepřátelského majetku a Fondech národní obnovy
Retribution Redress of war and occupation

Nationalization of remaining property of: Germany/Hungary, or companies incorporated in Germany/Hungary physical persons having German or Hungarian ethnicity, unless they prove that they remained loyal to the Czechoslovak Republic and that they had not committed offence against the Czech or Slovak nation and that they had either taken part in the liberation of Czechoslovakia or were subject to nacist or fascist terror traitors Establishment of the Fund of National Restoration

Subject of many contemporary court decisions, especially in proceedings whereby descendants of former owners are attempting to prove that their ancestors fulfil the requirements of remunaration in cases where authorities in 1940s and 1950s did not consider the ancestors loyal to the Republic and/or subject to Nazi terror
Decree of the President concerning the management of production Dekret prezidenta o řízení výroby
Minister of Industry may issue Directives in order to safeguard functioning of enterprises and provisioning of population.
Decree of the President concerning the organization of peoples' and art production Dekret prezidenta o organisaci lidové a umělecké výroby
Decree of the President concerning the adjustment, management and control of foreign trade Dekret prezidenta o úpravě, řízení a kontrole zahraničního obchodu

Decree of the President concerning the establishment of new directorates of posts and on adjustment of districts of post directorates in the lands of Bohemia and Moravia-Silesia Dekret prezidenta o zřízení nových ředitelství pošt a o úpravě obvodů ředitelství pošt v zemích České a Moravskoslezské
Decree of the President concerning the management of coal and firewood Dekret prezidenta o hospodaření uhlím a palivovým dřívím
Establishment of central authority for management of coal and firewood.

Decree of the President concerning the amendment of act of 25 July 1926 No. 122/1928 Coll, on adjustment of wages of priests of churches and divine societies officially recognized by the state Dekret prezidenta o změně zákona ze dne 25. června 1926, č. 122 Sb. a vlád. nařízení ze dne 17. července 1928, č. 124 Sb., o úpravě platů duchovenstva církví a náboženských společností státem uznaných případně recipovaných, a o platovém přídavku k nejnižšímu ročnímu příjmu duchovenstva
Decree of the President concerning the adjustment of provisions regulating the declaration of death Dekret prezidenta, kterým se upravují ustanovení o prohlášení za mrtvého
Decree of the President concerning the measures in proceedings regarding nutrition management Dekret prezidenta o opatřeních v řízení vyživovacího hospodářství
Minister of Nutrition may manage purchase, processing and usage of goods in order to secure nutrition of population.
Decree of the President concerning the interim adjustement of military criminal code Dekret prezidenta o přechodné úpravě vojenského trestního řádu
Decree of the President concerning the interim adjustment of military field trials Dekret prezidenta o přechodné úpravě vojenského polního trestního řízení
Decree of the President concerning the territorial organization of administration performed by national committees Dekret prezidenta o územní organisaci správy, vykonávané národními výbory
Reestablishment of regional and municipal self-governance as it existed prior to the occupation.
Decree of the President concerning the abolishment of the German University in Prague Dekret prezidenta o zrušení německé university v Praze
Decree of the President concerning the abolishment of German Institutes of Technology in Prague and Brno Dekret prezidenta o zrušení německých vysokých škol technických v Praze a v Brně
Decree of the President concerning some measures in the issue of public registers Dekret prezidenta o některých opatřeních ve věcech knihovních

Where Germany, Hungary, German or Hungarian corporation had obtained ownership by inscription into public registry of anything that had previously belonged to the Czechoslovakia, Czech lands or corporations owned or administrated by them, the original inscription was to be reinstated.
Decree of the President concerning the establishment of the Concspcription Union Dekret prezidenta o zřízení Svazu brannosti
Conscription Union provides training of conscripts.
Decree of the President concerning the special forced work units Dekret prezidenta o zvláštních nucených pracovních oddílech
Establishment of work units at prisons. Convicts' remuneration shall be forfeited by the state.
Decree of the President concerning the establishment of Academy of Performing Arts in Prague Dekret prezidenta o zřízení vysoké školy "Akademie musických umění v Praze"
Academy of Performing Arts in Prague

Decree of the President concerning the interim territorial organization of some financial offices and on other changes connected Dekret prezidenta o zatímní územní organisaci některých finančních úřadů a změnách s tím spojených v zemích České a Moravskoslezské
Restoration of Financial Offices (tax revenue offices) as they had been prior to the occupation.
Decree of the President concerning the establishment of the Czech Filharmonic Orchestra Dekret prezidenta o státním orchestru Česká filharmonie
Decree of the President concerning the public enlightenment care Dekret prezidenta o státní péči osvětové
Building at Spálená 12, today the Municipal Polyclinic of Prague
Decree of the President concerning the education of teachers Dekret prezidenta o vzdělání učitelstva
Compulsory University education of school teachers.
Today the National Institute for Education
Today a faculty of the Charles University in its own right.

Constitutional Decree of the President concerning the remand of persons that were considered as unreliable during the time of revolution Ústavní dekret prezidenta o zajištění osob, které byly považovány za státně nespolehlivé, v době revoluční
Decree of the President concerning the punishment of some offenses against the national honor Dekret prezidenta o trestání některých provinění proti národní cti

Administrative punishment for "improper behavior offending the national feelings of Czech or Slovak people leading to public indignation" in the time after 21 May 1938 (up to one year imprisonment, fine).
Decree of the President concerning the interim adjustment of legal relations of the Czechoslovak National Bank Dekret prezidenta o přechodné úpravě právních poměrů Národní banky Československé
Introduces, inter alia, interim administration of the National Bank.
Decree of the President concerning the establishment of the College of Political and Social Arts in Prague Dekret prezidenta o zřízení Vysoké školy politické a sociální v Praze
Decree of the President concerning the limitation of the right of prosecution in the criminal proceedings Dekret prezidenta o omezení žalobního práva v trestním řízení

Persons whose property was nationalized under Act No. 108/1945 Coll., and whose honor was harmed may not initiate criminal proceedings against the offender under the respective statute themselves but may only request the State Attorney to do so.
The Decree itself set validity only until 31 December 1946
